events.title: Cat Adoption Day
events.description: Find your new feline friend at this event.

events.title: Community Gardening
events.description: Join us as we tend to the community edible plants.

events.title: Beach Cleanup

events.title: Horror Festival

events.description: Fishermen sell their products on the Market Square directly from fishing boats and sales huts.

events.title: Uniarts Fest
events.description: Uniarts Fest presents the freshest art in the city.
